Today on the Causeway Coast, White Park Bay and Portballintrae are shining with 3 ft @ 6s NW and light 8 mph SSW winds. Best conditions are on the push from 08:50 to 16:12. Tomorrow, expect a drop in quality with 6 ft @ 7s NNW and fresh 27 mph NNW winds making it blown out. Day after brings back some fun with 3 ft @ 8s WNW, light 7 mph WSW winds, and better conditions at the same good spots. Best: today.
